patthana1.18:1.1_0: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—uppannā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana1.18:1.1_1: khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe uppannā
patthana1.18:1.1_2: hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:2.1_0: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—uppannaṁ cakkhuṁ aniccato
patthana1.18:2.1_1: dukkhato anattato vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi
patthana1.18:2.1_2: uppajjati, vicikicchā …pe… uddhaccaṁ …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati. Uppannaṁ sotaṁ …
patthana1.18:2.1_3: ghānaṁ … jivhaṁ … kāyaṁ … rūpe … sadde … gandhe … rase … phoṭṭhabbe … vatthuṁ … uppanne
patthana1.18:2.1_4: khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati. Dibbena cakkhunā
patthana1.18:2.1_5: rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe…
patthana1.18:2.1_6: phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa …pe… uppannā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, āvajjanāya
patthana1.18:3.1_0: Anuppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—anuppanne rūpe …
patthana1.18:3.1_1: sadde … gandhe … rase … phoṭṭhabbe … anuppanne khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato
patthana1.18:3.1_2: vipassati …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati. Anuppannā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa,
patthana1.18:4.1_0: Uppādī dhammo uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—uppādiṁ cakkhuṁ …pe…
patthana1.18:4.1_1: kāyaṁ … rūpe … gandhe … rase … phoṭṭhabbe … vatthuṁ … uppādī khandhe aniccato dukkhato
patthana1.18:4.1_2: anattato …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati. Uppādī khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa,
patthana1.18:5.1_0: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.18:5.1_1: Ārammaṇādhipati—uppannaṁ cakkhuṁ garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā
patthana1.18:5.1_2: rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. Uppannaṁ sotaṁ … ghānaṁ … jivhaṁ … kāyaṁ … rūpe
patthana1.18:5.1_3: … sadde … gandhe … rase … phoṭṭhabbe … vatthuṁ … uppanne khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti
patthana1.18:5.1_4: abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati …pe…. Sahajātādhipati—uppannā adhipati
patthana1.18:5.1_5: sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:6.1_0: Anuppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇādhipati—anuppanne
patthana1.18:6.1_1: rūpe … sadde … gandhe … rase … phoṭṭhabbe … anuppanne khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti
patthana1.18:6.1_2: abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.18:7.1_0: Uppādī dhammo uppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇādhipati—uppādiṁ
patthana1.18:7.1_1: cakkhuṁ …pe… kāyaṁ … rūpe …pe… phoṭṭhabbe … vatthuṁ … uppādī khandhe garuṁ katvā
patthana1.18:7.1_2: assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.18:8.1_0: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo—uppanno eko khandho
patthana1.18:8.1_1: tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ sahajātapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.18:8.1_2: dve khandhā dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:8.1_3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe uppanno eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ sahajātapaccayena
patthana1.18:8.1_4: paccayo …pe… dve khandhā dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ sahajātapaccayena
patthana1.18:8.1_5: paccayo. Khandhā vatthussa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. Vatthu khandhānaṁ sahajātapaccayena
patthana1.18:8.1_6: paccayo. Ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ tiṇṇannaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ sahajātapaccayena paccayo …pe… dve
patthana1.18:8.1_7: mahābhūtā …pe… mahābhūtā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ kaṭattārūpānaṁ upādārūpānaṁ sahajātapaccayena
patthana1.18:8.1_8: paccayo. bāhiraṁ … āhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ … utusamuṭṭhānaṁ … asaññasattānaṁ ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ
patthana1.18:8.1_9: …pe… dve mahābhūtā …pe… mahābhūtā kaṭattārūpānaṁ upādārūpānaṁ sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:9.1_0: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa aññamaññapaccayena paccayo—uppanno eko khandho
patthana1.18:9.1_1: tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ aññamaññapaccayena paccayo …pe… dve khandhā …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana1.18:9.1_2: uppanno eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ vatthussa ca aññamaññapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:9.1_3: Dve khandhā …pe… khandhā vatthussa aññamaññapaccayena paccayo. Vatthu khandhānaṁ
patthana1.18:9.1_4: aññamaññapaccayena paccayo. Ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe… bāhiraṁ … āhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ … utusamuṭṭhānaṁ
patthana1.18:9.1_5: … asaññasattānaṁ ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ tiṇṇannaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ aññamaññapaccayena paccayo
patthana1.18:10.1_0: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa nissayapaccayena paccayo—uppanno eko khandho
patthana1.18:10.1_1: tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ nissayapaccayena paccayo …pe… dve
patthana1.18:10.1_2: khandhā …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… khandhā vatthussa …pe… vatthu khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana1.18:10.1_3: ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe… bāhiraṁ … āhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ … utusamuṭṭhānaṁ … asaññasattānaṁ
patthana1.18:10.1_4: ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe… mahābhūtā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ kaṭattārūpānaṁ upādārūpānaṁ
patthana1.18:10.1_5: cakkhāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe… kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa …pe… vatthu uppannānaṁ
patthana1.18:11.1_0: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.18:11.1_1: pakatūpanissayo …pe…. Pakatūpanissayo—uppannaṁ utuṁ upanissāya jhānaṁ uppādeti, vipassanaṁ
patthana1.18:11.1_2: …pe… maggaṁ …pe… abhiññaṁ …pe… samāpattiṁ uppādeti, mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti.
patthana1.18:11.1_3: Uppannaṁ bhojanaṁ …pe… senāsanaṁ upanissāya jhānaṁ uppādeti vipassanaṁ …pe… maggaṁ
patthana1.18:11.1_4: …pe… abhiññaṁ …pe… samāpattiṁ uppādeti, mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti. Uppannaṁ
patthana1.18:11.1_5: utu … bhojanaṁ … senāsanaṁ uppannāya saddhāya …pe… paññāya, kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa
patthana1.18:12.1_0: Anuppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.18:12.1_2: deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ karoti. Anuppannaṁ saddasampadaṁ … gandhasampadaṁ
patthana1.18:12.1_3: … rasasampadaṁ … phoṭṭhabbasampadaṁ … anuppanne khandhe patthayamāno dānaṁ deti,
patthana1.18:12.1_4: sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ karoti. Anuppannā vaṇṇasampadā …pe… anuppannā khandhā
patthana1.18:12.1_5: uppannāya saddhāya …pe… paññāya, kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa, maggassa,
patthana1.18:13.1_0: Uppādī dhammo uppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.18:13.1_1: pakatūpanissayo …pe…. Pakatūpanissayo—uppādiṁ cakkhusampadaṁ patthayamāno dānaṁ deti,
patthana1.18:13.1_2: sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ karoti. Uppādiṁ sotasampadaṁ …pe… kāyasampadaṁ …pe…
patthana1.18:13.1_3: vaṇṇasampadaṁ … gandhasampadaṁ … rasasampadaṁ … phoṭṭhabbasampadaṁ … uppādī khandhe
patthana1.18:13.1_4: patthayamāno dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ karoti. Uppādī cakkhusampadā
patthana1.18:13.1_5: …pe… kāyasampadā … vaṇṇasampadā …pe… phoṭṭhabbasampadā … uppādī khandhā uppannāya
patthana1.18:13.1_6: saddhāya …pe… paññāya, kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā
patthana1.18:14.1_0: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana1.18:14.1_1: vatthupurejātaṁ. Ārammaṇapurejātaṁ—cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ aniccato dukkhato anattato
patthana1.18:14.1_2: vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati
patthana1.18:14.1_3: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa
patthana1.18:14.1_5: cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe… vatthu uppannānaṁ khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:15.1: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—pacchājātā uppannā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:16.1_0: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—uppannā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana1.18:16.1_1: khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana1.18:16.1_2: uppannā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:17.1_0: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—vipāko uppanno eko khandho
patthana1.18:17.1_1: tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ vipākapaccayena paccayo …pe… dve
patthana1.18:17.1_2: khandhā …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe uppanno eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca
patthana1.18:17.1_3: rūpānaṁ …pe… dve khandhā …pe… khandhā vatthussa vipākapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:18.1_0: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—uppannā āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana1.18:18.1_1: khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana1.18:19.1_0: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—uppannā indriyā sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana1.18:19.1_1: khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana1.18:20.1_0: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa jhānapaccayena paccayo … maggapaccayena paccayo
patthana1.18:20.1_1: … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ,
patthana1.18:20.1_2: pacchājātaṁ. Sahajātā—uppannā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena
patthana1.18:20.1_3: paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe uppannā khandhā kaṭattārūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:20.1_4: Khandhā vatthussa, vatthu khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Purejātaṁ—cakkhāyatanaṁ
patthana1.18:20.1_5: cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe… kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa … vatthu uppannānaṁ khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena
patthana1.18:20.1_6: paccayo. Pacchājātā—uppannā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:21.1_0: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ,
patthana1.18:21.1_1: pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ. Sahajāto—uppanno eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana1.18:21.1_2: cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe… dve khandhā …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana1.18:21.1_3: …pe… ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe… bāhiraṁ … āhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ … utusamuṭṭhānaṁ … asaññasattānaṁ
patthana1.18:21.1_4: …pe…. Purejātaṁ—cakkhuṁ aniccato …pe… vatthuṁ aniccato …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati,
patthana1.18:21.1_5: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotudhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa
patthana1.18:21.1_6: …pe… phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Cakkhāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa
patthana1.18:21.1_7: …pe… kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa …pe… vatthu uppannānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena
patthana1.18:21.1_8: paccayo. Pacchājātā—uppannā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:21.1_9: Kabaḷīkāro āhāro—imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Rūpajīvitindriyaṁ—kaṭattārūpānaṁ
patthana1.18:22.1: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa avigatapaccayena paccayo …pe….
patthana1.18:23.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi, sahajāte ekaṁ, aññamaññe ekaṁ, nissaye
patthana1.18:23.1_1: ekaṁ, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte ekaṁ, pacchājāte kamme vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne
patthana1.18:23.1_2: magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyā avigate ekaṁ. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.18:25.1_0: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena
patthana1.18:25.1_1: paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena
patthana1.18:26.1: Anuppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:27.1: Uppādī dhammo uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:28.1: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… navippayutte tīṇi, noatthiyā dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi, noavigate dve. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.18:30.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… nonatthiyā novigate ekaṁ.
patthana1.18:32.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi, sahajāte ekaṁ, aññamaññe ekaṁ, nissaye
patthana1.18:32.1_1: ekaṁ, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte ekaṁ, pacchājāte ekaṁ, kamme vipāke āhāre indriye
patthana1.18:32.1_2: jhāne magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyā avigate ekaṁ.
